ABOUT US WHAT WE DO            We Are Informa Markets Informa Markets connects buyers and sellers and supports the flow of business and trade in over a dozen specialist markets. Our platforms help businesses meet, discover products, trade and grow through major exhibitions, virtual events, online marketplaces, specialist content and data services.      What We Do  Discover more about our 450+ specialist brands         LEARN MORE      Where We Are  Connect with 3,500+ colleagues in more than 30 countries  LEARN MORE      Our Community  Find out why Informa Markets is a great place to work         LEARN MORE           Helping Specialist Markets Trade and Grow Industries and markets flourish when the right people - buyers, sellers, decision makers - are able to understand the latest trends, develop and discover new products, generate leads for their business, meet new customers and suppliers and trade. Informa Markets connects buyers and sellers, helping them innovate and grow and supporting the flow of business in over a dozen specialist international markets.  LEARN MORE LEARN MORE                        Depth in Specialist B2B Brands Our platforms deliver large-scale exhibitions, virtual events, online marketplaces, specialist content and data services. Many of our B2B brands are long-established and our live events have become not-to-be-missed gatherings, located in major hubs and on major trade routes. Across both in-person and virtual platforms, we provide opportunities for buyers and sellers to build relationships, see and show products and do business. We work in all major regions, with a significant presence in Asia, North America and the Middle East.  VIEW BRANDS VIEW BRANDS                               When People Get Together, Great Things Happen. If you’ve never felt the buzz of the show floor – it’s time! Let your customers see, feel and source products that will help elevate their business to new heights. Meet your customers and suppliers in-person, build lifelong relationships and grow your business. Nothing beats the power of face-to-face!
